reviews.text: This is my home away from home as I stay in this hotel at least once a month! Overall, the breakfast is quite good as they have hot & cold food. Room wise, it is clean & swedish-looki
reviews.title: My home away from home... in Sweden!

reviews.text: Stayed here a couple of times with work, it's in a great central location, the staff are pretty helpful and the room although small is clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: The best margaritas in Sweden!
Good Hotel
reviews.text: Breakfast's here are great with loads of selection. Haven't eaten here in the evenings, there's some good restaurants close by. The bar stays open late and serves some great margaritas!
There's no gym here which is a bit of a let down.
reviews.title: No complaints

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a room for 99 euros a night online at the Marina Plaza, and upon arriving, also paid about 20 euros per night in order to park in the adjacent public parking structure.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with amazing breakfast!

reviews.text: Overall, I thought this hotel was a good value for that money. The lobby area is quite nice -- rooms, not so much. They are very dated, with a "nautical" theme to them. Because they looked old, I felt like the room wasn't as clean as I would have liked it to be, but, honestly, I didn't find any dirt or anything in the room, so there were really no problems.
reviews.title: Great location and a fine hotel

likes.liked: — Stylish, modern room with great views from balcony
likes.disliked: — Communal balcony required use of blinds, thus blocking out the view!

reviews.text: We had to get two twin beds, but they were comfortable. Our room had A/C which kept it at a comfortable temperature during a hot day. The bathroom was split into two different rooms (toilet and shower) and the shower worked very well. There was a refrigerator for keeping snacks and drinks cool.
reviews.title: Not a good experience

likes.disliked: — The room wasnt fresh eveything worn dirty and old.

reviews.text: The hotel was pretty quiet, but the location - exactly in the middle of town, on the water, and next to the ferry center, was great. There are many restaurants just outside the hotel's doors, as well as a little beach which is closeby. The hotel also has a fitness center on the top floor.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

likes.disliked: — It's so far away from home!

reviews.text: The best thing about this hotel, however, was the free breakfast buffet. It was amazing. I would stay here again just for that! Wonderful breads, cheese, cold cuts, veggies, eggs, Swedish pancakes, sausage, fruit, tea, coffee... what a great way to start the day! And, considering that food isn't exactly cheap in Sweden, it really helps budget-minded travelers stay on track.
reviews.title: Really nice hotel in absolutely the best location in town

reviews.text: The hotel is excellently connected just a few steps away from the train/bus/ferry interchange and in walking distance of the historic town centre. Everything about it is extremely efficient and the staff extremely pleasant and helpful, speaking excellent English for a non-Scandanavian such as myself.
reviews.title: Perfectly Acceptable

reviews.text: As a first time visitor to Sweden I was unsure of what to expect but if I can be so bold as to make an analogy then the Marina Plaza is to hotels what Ikea is to furniture...it functions, perfectly, delivers what you need whilst not being neither too ostentatious nor overly expensive.
reviews.title: Logistically good location, good service, but oldish and... pay attention to thieves !

reviews.text: The rooms are failry bijou but on reflection they have absolutely everything you need (especiially enjoyed the chaise longue). If I do have a minor criticism I would have appreciated a slightly wider bath tub and a more powerful shower but I am getting onto fairly minor points here.
reviews.title: Convenient business hotel

reviews.text: One additional word of thanks to the reception staff who opened the gym for me at 5am on both days that I stayed as my body was still on Far East time. Rational behaviour to reasonable requests make us all human rather than machines and was very much appreciated.
reviews.title: Good Place for Business in Helsingborg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed about 5 times already ibn this hotel, and this time I stayed 3 days 2 nights for a conference. The rooms start to be oldish and worn, decoration obsolete, but still OK for business stay. Young and dynamic local staff at desk and restaurant are very nice and helpful.
reviews.title: Could be a lot better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There isn't anything wrong with the hotel per se, but we were nevertheless disappointed with the whole experience. We thought we paid a little more to stay in a better hotel. But that wasn't the case.
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay here next time

reviews.text: Everything costed more. The parking was very expensive. And wireless internet too. They advertise free high speed internet, but that is not wireless. And with two lap tops and two iphones, we had to pay extra to get both of us online. And that wasn't cheap!
reviews.title: Great hotel in Helsingborg

reviews.text: They also advertise that the hotel has a climate device ("klimaanlegg" in Swedish). This is not to be confused with A/C. The rooms were so hot and stuffy, and it was impossible to get the temperature down.
reviews.title: Liked the ambience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff at the reception desk were clueless and not very helpful. For instance, we arrived early (10:30 am), and were not allowed to park in the hotel's parking spaces. Even though there were plenty available.
reviews.title: Good location, nice hotel, just a few things to bear in mind

reviews.text: My advice is: go for a cheaper alternative because you won't feel you get your money's worth in this one.
reviews.title: Excellent Location in Helsingborg.
